message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value to you and my costs, I propose a price of $130 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product. However, I have a limited budget in mind for this purchase. Would you consider a price closer to $80?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. However, given the quality and value of the product, I cannot lower the price below $100. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
